newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey's Ciller to visit Jordan next week.
newsitem.headline: Turkey's Ciller to visit Jordan next week.

text.p: Turkish Foreign Minister Tansu Ciller will visit Jordan next week in a trip that has been postponed twice before, a foreign ministry spokesman said on Wednesday.

Jordan is one of the few Arab countries that has not criticised a proposed Turkish security zone against Turkish Kurd rebels forces in northern Iraq. The buffer plan was announced in September but has not yet been put into force.
Ciller's visit will take place next Monday. The last time it was postponed was in September due to fighting between Iraqi Kurdish groups.
Ankara and Amman allow U.S. planes to patrol no-fly zones over northern and southern Iraq respectively from their own territory.
